thread.title: Boy's body retrieved from quarry
thread.title_full: Boy's body retrieved from quarry | News24

author: news24.com
title: Boy's body retrieved from quarry
text:
Cape Town - The body of a 12-year-old boy has been retrieved from a quarry between Deneysville and Oranjeville, police have confirmed.
The child had disappeared under water while swimming with friends in a quarry on Sunday afternoon, the NSRI said earlier.
Police spokesperson Lieutenant Livhuhani Hani said a body has been removed from the water and an inquest docket has been opened into the drowning.
The NSRIâ€™s Craig Lambinon told News24 that when its members arrived at the scene after being called to assist, police refused to allow them access.
